Package com.thales.dis.mobile.idcloud.auth

Interface IdCloudClient

public interface IdCloudClient
An interface that creates the request for all of IdCloud client operations.
Since:
1.0.0

  • Method Details

    • setClientID

      void setClientID(String clientId) throws IdCloudClientException
      Set the clientId. The clientId needs to be configured for all use cases aside from the Enrolment.
      Parameters:
      clientId -
      Throws:
      IdCloudClientException
      Since:
      2.5.0

    • getClientIDs

      List<String> getClientIDs()
      Get all enrolled clientIds in the device
      Returns:
      List of clientId
      Since:
      2.5.0

    • getActivatedAuthenticators

      @NonNull List<Authenticator> getActivatedAuthenticators() throws IdCloudClientException
      Fetch the activated authenticators for the enrolled credential It should be called from background thread.
      Returns:
      A List of Authenticator instance.
      Throws:
      IdCloudClientException - exception thrown when error occurs.
      Since:
      2.2.0

    • createEnrollRequest

      @NonNull EnrollRequest createEnrollRequest(@NonNull EnrollmentToken enrollmentToken, @NonNull UiCallbacks uiCallbacks, @NonNull EnrollRequestCallback requestCallback)
      Creates an enrollment request. The request's execution is triggered separately through EnrollRequest.execute().
      Parameters:
      enrollmentToken - Contains the token to initiate enrollment with the IdCloud server.
      uiCallbacks - Group of ui callbacks allowing developers to show the UI during PIN or biometric authentication.
      requestCallback - Callback to return the final outcome (success or failure) of the enrollment operation.
      Returns:
      An EnrollRequest instance.
      Since:
      1.0.0

    • createFetchRequest

      @NonNull FetchRequest createFetchRequest(@NonNull UiCallbacks uiCallbacks, @NonNull FetchRequestCallback requestCallback)
      Creates a fetch request. The request's execution is triggered separately through FetchRequest.execute().
      Parameters:
      uiCallbacks - Group of ui callback allow developers to show the UI during PIN or biometric authentication.
      requestCallback - Callback to return the final outcome (success or failure) of the fetch operation.
      Returns:
      A FetchRequest instance.
      Since:
      1.0.0

    • createChangePinRequest

      @NonNull ChangePinRequest createChangePinRequest(@NonNull SecurePinPadUiCallback uiCallback, @NonNull ChangePinRequestCallback requestCallback)
      Creates a change pin request. The request's execution is triggered separately through ChangePinRequest.execute().
      Parameters:
      uiCallback - UI callback allow developers to show the UI during change PIN operation
      requestCallback - Callback to return the final outcome (success or failure) of the change pin operation.
      Returns:
      A ChangePinRequest instance.
      Since:
      1.1.0

    • createRemoveAuthenticatorRequest

      @NonNull RemoveAuthenticatorRequest createRemoveAuthenticatorRequest(@NonNull Authenticator.Type authenticatorType, @NonNull RemoveAuthenticatorRequestCallback requestCallback)
      Creates a remove authenticator request. The request's execution is triggered separately through RemoveAuthenticatorRequest.execute().
      Parameters:
      authenticatorType - The type of the authenticator to be removed.
      requestCallback - Callback to return the final outcome (success or failure) of the remove authenticator operation.
      Returns:
      A RemoveAuthenticatorRequest instance.

    • createRefreshPushTokenRequest

      @NonNull RefreshPushTokenRequest createRefreshPushTokenRequest(@NonNull NotificationProfile notificationProfile, @NonNull RefreshPushTokenRequestCallback requestCallback)
      Send the new push token to server. Creates a refresh push token request. The request's execution is triggered separately through RefreshPushTokenRequest.execute().
      Parameters:
      notificationProfile - Contains the push notification token.
      requestCallback - Callback to return the final outcome (success or failure) of the refresh push token operation.
      Returns:
      A RefreshPushTokenRequest instance.
      Since:
      2.1.0

    • createProcessNotificationRequest

      @NonNull ProcessNotificationRequest createProcessNotificationRequest(@NonNull Map<String,String> notification, @NonNull UiCallbacks uiCallbacks, @NonNull ProcessNotificationRequestCallback requestCallback)
      Execute the push notification. IdCloudClient parses the push notification payload to fetching the pending event based on Event Id. User will need to perform authentication with the the configured authenticator based on the pending event. Creates a process notification request. The request's execution is triggered separately through ProcessNotificationRequest.execute().
      Parameters:
      notification - A Map of push notification payload.
      uiCallbacks - Group of ui callback allow developers to show the UI during PIN or biometric authentication.
      requestCallback - Callback to return the final outcome (success or failure) of the process notification operation.
      Returns:
      A ProcessNotificationRequest instance.
      Since:
      2.1.0

    • configureSecureLog

      static com.thalesgroup.gemalto.securelog.SecureLog configureSecureLog(@Nullable com.thalesgroup.gemalto.securelog.SecureLogConfig config)
      Sets the secure logger intended to log necessary retrievable information.
      Parameters:
      config - A configuration object of secure log.
      Returns:
      An instance of `SecureLog` or `null` if config set is nil.
      Since:
      2.0.0
